Sql.query: insert into trn_recalculo ( recacodi, pericodi, recafecinicio, recafecfinal, recadescripcion, recausername, recafecins ) values ( :recacodi, :pericodi, :recafecinicio, :recafecfinal, :recadescripcion, :recausername, :recafecins )
update trn_recalculo set recafecinicio = :recafecinicio, recafecfinal = :recafecfinal, recadescripcion = :recadescripcion, recafecact = :recafecact where recacodi = :recacodi and pericodi =:pericodi
select * from trn_recalculo where pericodi = :pericodi order by recacodi desc
select * from trn_recalculo where (recadescripcion like '%' + :recadescripcion + '%' or :recadescripcion is null)
select nvl(max(recacodi), 0) + 1 from trn_recalculo where pericodi = :pericodi
select max(recacodi) as recacodi from trn_recalculo where pericodi=:pericodi
